name: AutomationPolicyPrecheck
summary: ResumeGenius automation policy precheck for talent workflows.
description: Review resume-generation automation against privacy, consent, and brand governance rules before enabling a new workflow.
acceptance_criteria: Confirms applicable automation and change-management policies for the proposed update.
Documents potential compliance risks with recommended mitigations or required approvals.
Validates candidate consent handling and records the go/no-go recommendation with approvers.

name: ATSFitAnalyzer
summary: Assess resume alignment with a target job using ATS scoring insights.
description: Leverage the ATS scoring service to evaluate resume compatibility, highlight strengths and gaps, and recommend concrete optimization steps tailored to the job description.
acceptance_criteria: Presents the ATS compatibility score with a short explanation of the scoring rubric and any confidence limits.
Summarizes matched strengths and identifies the most critical missing keywords or experience gaps relative to the job description.
Delivers a prioritized list of optimization actions with guidance on how to adjust resume content or structure.

triggers: Score below threshold without actionable mitigations
